Detailed Description

Models the departure of a customer from an event-based simulation. 

 CustomerDepartureEvent:
   if |Q| > 0:
     T Q.front -> StartCheckoutEvent @ t+1

called when this event "happens".

If the line behind them is not empty, the customer will trigger a StartCheckoutEvent on the front.
